title: Consonant Sound Match
description: An interactive MicroSim where kindergarten students click consonant letters to hear their primary sounds with example words and pictures, building systematic letter-sound knowledge.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonics
Letter-Sound Correspondence
learningObjectives: Identify the primary sound of each consonant letter
Associate consonant sounds with example words
Connect letter shapes with their sounds

controls.label: Hear Again
controls.description: Replay the sound and word for the selected letter

controls.label: Letter Buttons
controls.description: Click any consonant to hear its sound

assumptions: User has mouse or touchscreen input
User knows letter names but learning sounds
limitations: Only covers primary sound for each consonant
Some consonants have multiple sounds not covered
Speech synthesis quality varies by browser
